attributes.action: stop the home office from sending Darfuri asylum seekers to Khartoum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is irrefutable evidence that Darfuri asylum seekers face torture when forcibly removed from the UK and sent to Khartoum.

This makes a mockery of the government's claims to support genuine asylum seekers.  There is a concerted effort to remove significant numbers of people - to face torture or death from the regime that forced them into fleeing their country in the first place.

Tony Blair - you must act now to end this shameful policy and to ensure that a genuine safe haven is offered to people who need it.
